content.html: I’m afraid todays system simply isn’t comparable with the 1990’s system. With tuition fees and basic maintenance loan a student now is leaving university with minimum £38k to be paid back (effectively) through the tax system. For many (without parental support) it’s much more.
content.value: I’m afraid todays system simply isn’t comparable with the 1990’s system.  With tuition fees and basic maintenance loan a student now is leaving university with minimum £38k to be paid back (effectively) through the tax system. For many (without parental support) it’s much more.
